name: m42-claude-plugins
description: Mission42 Claude Code plugins for modular development workflows: planning, sprint orchestration, task execution, and meta-tooling

plugins.name: m42-sprint
plugins.description: Sprint orchestration with ralph-loop driven task queue processing, polymorphic task types, and progress tracking

plugins.name: m42-meta-toolkit
plugins.description: Meta-tooling for creating and managing Claude Code artifacts (skills, commands, subagents, hooks) with quality assurance workflows

plugins.name: m42-signs
plugins.description: Learning loop for agent evolution - extracts wisdom from session failures and applies them as signs in CLAUDE.md files

plugins.name: m42-dev
plugins.description: Development toolkit for software engineers - specs, planning, and daily practice support
